author: rohit.zoro
content: Does anyone know if one can run validators on sepolia?

author: rohit.zoro
content: How can I get myself whitelisted to run validators on sepolia? And does sepolia have a deposit contract for validator activation??

author: jgm
content: In general, you cannot.  Sepolia runs with a minimal set of validators and is designed to run a stable environment where users can tests out dapps and other execution layer items.  If you want to run a validator you should do so on holesky.

author: rohit.zoro
content: Thanks for clarifying! One of the clients had their testnet on sepolia and they wanted to test enabling staking.
